channel.title: Posts on Life As A Software Engineer
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Life As A Software Engineer

item.title: s VS s[:]
item.description: s[:] is always a slice. But s can be one of these A array or A pointer to array or A slice https://play.golang.org/p/r2nc-FAmjg

item.title: XML omitempty with enclosed elements
item.description: omitempty is only used in marshalling. But it does not work with enclosed elements. https://play.golang.org/p/DEgzD3rwhw http://stackoverflow.com/questions/27246275/golang-hide-xml-parent-tag-if-empty

item.title: XML cdata tag
item.description: cdata tag is used in marshalling. It is not needed in unmarshalling. https://play.golang.org/p/xEXFBCkC29

item.title: First
item.description: This is the beginning post of the new site. $ ls
